cm:configItem.cm:name: handlerChain
cm:configItem.cm:description: Specifies the list of handlers to be used for the endpoint. The list can contain a mix of logical and protocol handlers.

cm:configItem.cm:name: enableHandlerInit
cm:configItem.cm:description: Set to true if initialisation of handlers is required. If an init method is present on the handler class, this will be invoked, passing a map of init parameters and values. If no init method is present, the Celtix runtime will attempt to inject the init paremeters into the class members that are decorated with the @Resource annotation. Default is false.

cm:configItem.cm:name: systemHandlerChain
cm:configItem.cm:description: Specifies the list of system handlers to be used for the endpoint. System handlers are created along with the client binding and - unlike regular JAX-WS handlers - cannot be changed. Their relative position w.r.t to regular handlers remains the same throughout the lifetime of the binding.

cm:configItem.cm:name: serverContextInspectors
cm:configItem.cm:description: List of classes used to inspect server context object and retrieve server address from.

cm:configItem.cm:name: enableSchemaValidation
cm:configItem.cm:description: Schema validation is disabled by default. Set this to true to enable schema validation.
